libra.complexpenaltydetails: A prior conviction for a 'serious offence' may make him/her liable to a mandatory life sentence under the provisions of section 109 of the Powers of Criminal Courts (Sentencing) Act 2000.

other.penalty:
INDICTMENT ONLY - Life imprisonment.

See Note (i) above re increase in penalty

Time limit for prosecutions:
None

welsh.welshlegislation: Yn groes i adran 8(1) Deddf Dwyn 1968.
welsh.welshstandardoffencewording:
Ar **(..SPECIFY DATE..) yn **(..SPECIFY TOWNSHIP..) bu i chi ysbeilio **(..SPECIFY THE PERSON..) o **(..SPECIFY THE PROPERTY..)

(A)_[a oedd werth £ **(..SPECIFY THE VALUE..)]_
(B)_[a'i werth yn anhysbys]_

english.notes:
(i) Officers should carefully check an offender's previous convictions. Provisions under sections 224 to 235 of the Criminal Justice Act 2003 may mean that s/he is liable to receive a longer sentence if certain conditions apply.
(ii) See also offence wordings: H433.
(iii) The CPS have issued guidance/charging standards for Theft Act crimes.
english.title: Robbery
english.legislation: Contrary to section 8(1) of the Theft Act 1968.
english.pointstoprove:
date and location
steal property
immediately before/at the time and in order to do so used force/put/seek to put
a person in fear of then and there being subjected to force

investigatoraction.description: Confirm proposed charge is appropriately authorised (Police or CPS)
Ensure compliance with investigator's obligations re disclosure
Consider if case suitable for referral to Financial Investigation Unit and CPS for asset recovery eg confiscation order
Consider an application for a sexual harm prevention order after conviction
DNA Samples: If crime scene stain present - take evidential sample If no crime scene stain & DNA not confirmed on PNC - take Criminal Justice sample. If DNA confirmed on PNC - CJ sample not required
Mandatory drug test required if 18 or over

english.standardoffencewording:
On **(..SPECIFY DATE..) at **(..SPECIFY TOWNSHIP..) robbed **(..SPECIFY THE PERSON..) of **(..SPECIFY THE PROPERTY..)

(A)_[to the value of **(..SPECIFY THE VALUE..)]_
(B)_[of a value unknown]_
